attributes.action: Call for a vote of No Confidence in the current government.
attributes.additional_details: Mental health professionals have identified many more difficulties since austerity measures began, see 'Psychologists Against Austerity', ref: https://psychagainstausterity.wordpress.com/ . My own financial and anxiety difficulties as a self-employed person with low income have greatly worsened with the bedroom tax and now tax credit cuts.  Soon, I'll have no income at all. Just one example....
attributes.background: The current government have repeatedly shown that they care nothing for the lower income earners of this country; their current plan to cut tax credits via Universal Credit, despite the House of Lords vetoing the original motion is just one example of that.
